column13: We had a fantastic time at Moton's. Patrick gave us superb service and the food was incredible. While not a typical choice, we started with steamed crab legs for an appetizer. They were amazing. I love crab legs but don't usually order them because of the mess required to eat them. These came out sliced in two giving us access to the meat without any of the mess. The wet towels afterwards were a nice touch. The salads were the largest I have ever seen and tasted amazing. My fillet was done exactly the way I like it, and the shrimp alexander was a nice complement. Of the sides, my favorite was the cheesy a gratin potatoes.
